溡字的基本解释

溡
shí
〔溡水〕古河名，在今中国山东省淄博市北。亦作“时水”。

溡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shí］
［《集韻》市之切，平之，禪。］
古水名。在今山东省内。

溡字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　溡； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页640第04
【集韻】市之切，音時。水名，在齊。通作時。澠水所入也。見【左傳·昭十二年註】。

溡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
溡字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
No
shí
〔溡水〕The name of the ancient river is in the north of Zibo City, Shandong Province, China. Also known as "time water".
No
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shí］
["Ji Yun" Chi Chi, Ping Chi, Zen. ]
Ancient water name. In today's Shandong Province.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　溡; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 640 04
[Jiyun] The cut of the city, the sound time. The name of the water is in Qi. Pass for the time. Mianshui also entered. See [Zuo Zhuan·Note on the Twelfth Year of Zhao].
